DOC.brief_summary: This research design study effect chiropractic adjustment physiological response ( EEG , EMG , HRV , skin temperature , respiration ) college student faculty population .
DOC.criteria: Asymptomatic subject ( without somatosensory peripheral pain ) recruit study . Subjects heart failure nervous system disease exclude study . Additional exclusion include osteoporosis , pregnancy , diabetes , vascular insufficiency , history joint replacement therapy . Subjects medical treatment , surgery trauma within six month exclude
